issue.title: edition.cnn.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://edition.cnn.com/2022/12/28/china/china-zhengzhou-car-pile-up-intl-hnk/index.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fedition.cnn.com%2F2022%2F12%2F28%2Fchina%2Fchina-zhengzhou-car-pile-up-intl-hnk%2Findex.html) ### Comment Username: @jslawler > Reported here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Adguard/comments/zy5fzq/cant_watch_videos_on_stove_sites_when_adguard_is/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app&utm_name=iossmf > > > Reproduced by me, using only AdGuard DNS filter. Safari protection was disabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/OhRZTiI.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/H3WKlNp.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.5 Browser: | Safari DNS filtering: | server: `Personal AdGuard DNS`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter` Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://open.spotify.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2F) ### Comment > The adguard is on, but ads keep playing every 3 song as if their isn't even an ad blocker at all ! I tried using the "Block ads on this site" feature and clicked on the ad but it only removed the image and not the add ad itself.. This extension was working fine until around June 2022, i tried to be patient and tried redownloading it but that didn't help. It's now almost 2023 and i'm tired of this. Please fix the issue asap ! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jmLHyoe.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.53 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,
List-KR
